synopsis.text: September 19th and 20th at Pacifico Yokohama's National Convention Hall, the Tiger & Bunny anime franchise will host special concerts featuring a new short anime. Yoshihiro Ike, the franchise's composer, will lead the 'Sternbild Orchestra & Band' in live performances of music from the television series and two films. In addition, an 18-minute episode, 'Tiger & Bunny: Too Many Cooks Spoil the Broth', will be released with the BD of the concert, 'The Sound of Tiger & Bunny'. In this episode, the Heroes from the series are tasked with forming a band for a one-time performance, showcasing their musical abilities alongside their heroic feats.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
